name: Double A
description:
This game was created for the Construct 3 Builder Jam #1.

The theme for the jam was "you only get one".

You Play as Barry the Battery, you are the only power source in the game and therefore the only one that can power the lights. 

Your aim is to get to the end of the level and recharge your battery.

You will need to use the available lights to memorise the next section of the level before you move away from the light.

Controls

left arrow or O - move left

right arrow or P - move right

up arrow or Z - jump
